title: PWA configuration with vite-plugin-pwa
description:
Configure PWA functionality using vite-plugin-pwa for offline-first experience.

Requirements per DESIGN.md:
- Install and configure vite-plugin-pwa
- Manifest: name='Reactivity Helper', short_name='ReactHelper', theme_color='#4F46E5', display='standalone'
- Service worker with cache-first strategy
- App icons (192x192, 512x512)
- Workbox runtime caching configuration

iOS-specific:
- apple-touch-icon link
- apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style meta tag

Acceptance criteria:
- PWA installs correctly on iOS/Android
- App works offline after first load
- Service worker registers successfully

title: Project scaffolding: Vite + React + TypeScript + Tailwind
description:
Set up the foundational project structure with Vite, React 18, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. This is the base that all other work depends on.

Requirements:
- Vite with React + TypeScript template
- Tailwind CSS with mobile-first configuration
- Basic folder structure per DESIGN.md (src/components, src/hooks, src/db, src/types)
- ESLint + Prettier configuration
- Base HTML with iOS meta tags (viewport-fit=cover, apple-mobile-web-app-capable)

Acceptance criteria:
- npm run dev starts the dev server
- TypeScript compilation works
- Tailwind utility classes are applied correctly
